title: Merz strikes cordial tone in Beijing, urges China to rein in Russia
summary_full: Chancellor Friedrich Merz used his first visit to Beijing to secure a major Airbus deal while pressing China on the war in Ukraine
summary_public: Chancellor Friedrich Merz used his first visit to Beijing to secure a major Airbus deal while pressing China on the war in Ukraine

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: urges China to rein in Russia

UA.label: neutral
UA.evidence: pressing China on the war in Ukraine
